Package interfaces.controller

Interface ITest

  • public interface ITest

    ESTG - Escola Superior de Tecnologia e Gestão
    IPP - Instituto Politécnico do Porto
    LEI - Licenciatura em Engenharia Informática
    LSIRC - Licenciatura em Segurança Informática em Redes de Computadores
    PP - Paradigmas de Programação
    2018 / 2019
    Ricardo Santos

    The "contract" that says which operations has to be available to handle a data structure used to store questions

    • Method Detail

      • addQuestion

        boolean addQuestion​(IQuestion q)
             throws TestException
        Adds a question to the first free position (i.e. null reference) of the data structure used to store questions
        Parameters:
        q - question to be added
        Returns:
        true if the question has been added, otherwise false
        Throws:
        TestException - if the question is null

      • getQuestion

        IQuestion getQuestion​(int pos)
               throws TestException
        Lookup a question at a specific position
        Parameters:
        pos - postion of the IQuestion to be fecthed
        Returns:
        question at the specified position
        Throws:
        TestException - if there is no question at the specified position

      • removeQuestion

        boolean removeQuestion​(int pos)
        Removes the first occurrence of a question from the data structure used to store questions. This operation puts a null reference in the position previously occupied by the question
        Parameters:
        pos - the positions of the question to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the {question has been removed, otherwise false

      • removeQuestion

        boolean removeQuestion​(IQuestion q)
        Removes the first occurrence of a question from the data structure used to store questions. This operation puts a null reference in the position previously occupied by the question
        Parameters:
        q - the question to be removed
        Returns:
        true if the {question has been removed, otherwise false

      • numberQuestions

        int numberQuestions()
        Returns the number of questions in the test
        Returns:
        number of questions in the test

      • isComplete

        boolean isComplete()
        Verified if all questions in the test are marked as done
        Returns:
        true if all questions in the test are marked as done, false otherwise

      • getTestStatistics

        ITestStatistics getTestStatistics()
        Gets an object that implements the contract ITestStatistics which calculates statistics from user answers
        Returns:
        an object which implements ITestStatistics of this test

      • loadFromJSONFile

        boolean loadFromJSONFile​(java.lang.String path)
                  throws TestException
        Loads all questions in the test from a text file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the text file
        Returns:
        true if the file was successfully loaded all questions in the test, false otherwise
        Throws:
        TestException - if there is no question at the specified position

      • setScoreStrategy

        void setScoreStrategy​(IScoreStrategy strategy)
        Sets the strategy to calculate the Test score
        Parameters:
        strategy - the strategy to calculate the Test score

      • getScoreStrategy

        IScoreStrategy getScoreStrategy()
        Gets the strategy to calculate the Test score
        Returns:
        The strategy to calculate the Test score

      • calculateScore

        java.lang.String calculateScore()
        Calculates the Score for the Test based on the defined strategy
        Returns:
        The Score for the Test based on the defined strategy

      • saveTestResults

        boolean saveTestResults​(java.lang.String path)
                 throws TestException
        Saves all questions in the test to a text file
        Parameters:
        path - the path to the text file
        Returns:
        true if the file was successfully saved all questions in the test, false otherwise
        Throws:
        TestException - if there is no question at the specified position
